title: Sketchbook: Full Color's (Sketchbook ~full color's~)
synopsis: To Sora Kajiwara, the world is full of wonderful and adorable things she wants to drawâ€”cats being a popular object of her affection. Even though there are some things that can't be captured with a pencil and paper, she still brings her sketchbook wherever she goes. Her love of drawing eventually leads her to join her school's art club, despite her shy and childish personality.
